In "From the Mixed Up Files of" this woman, a girl named Claudia & her brother run away from home & hide out at the Met Museum

Now boarding Oceanic Air Flight 815 for this drama; objects may shift through time & don't expect a happy landing

A practice opponent who makes you better, like Harvey Cody Jones for Muhammad Ali
There's a cozy word in this term for a player or a person who sits around waiting to go in

clues.clue: In 2021 the U.S. Secretary of State used this tennis expression to say it's North Korea's turn to make a move on nuclear talks
Sporty term for the action here that's deliberately, perhaps sarcastically, restrained
When the British settled these islands between Florida & Haiti, they were deserted
Captain William Bligh discovered a group of South Pacific islands in 1788 & named them for this ship
Recent surveys have found that the soil on this atoll has plutonium concentrations vastly higher than Chernobyl's
About 4.6 million people every year take the 35-minute ferry ride from Seattle to this island in Puget Sound
Drop an "A" from a colorful plant to get this Frenchman who also gave his name to an island in the Solomon Sea
Judges belonging to courts of these hear those cases, reviewing procedures & decisions of trial courts
District court judges conduct trials & manage the selection & instruction of these
An experienced attorney may act as a temporary judge in this type of court that hears cases involving limited dollar amounts
Federal magistrate judges consider pretrial these, such as for summary judgment
Makes sense that Texas leads the nation with more than 100 judges assigned to its 11 courts of this; California is second

Before Biden he was the last veep to later ascend to the presidency
33 days after taking the oath to be the veep, he took another one to not be the veep

This alliterative Lincoln vice president was a heavy smoker, but his grandson said he took it up on doctor's orders
Evangelist with a Tulsa university & current Supreme supreme
"Beantown" rotisserie restaurant chain & unregulated economic system in which business is lightly taxed
360 guy on CNN & "Leatherstocking Tales" teller
Sophocles play about a Theban king & a real king of the dinosaurs
Tall Emirati building & "See You Again" rapper

Related to sharks, this cartilaginous fish has more than 500 species, including the blue-spotted ribbontail
As a source of food & as a pack animal, this bovine has long been essential to the people of the Tibetan Plateau
Native to the southern U.S., the "alligator" this can grow 10' long, making it one of the largest freshwater fish

A monarch working to overcome his stammer is central to the plot of this Oscar winner

Pay your respects to the bronze Gerald & Lawrence Durrell on this Greek island where they spent much of their youth

Pronounced one way, it's a unit of time; another, a very small amount

It's not a special pet accessory, it's naval duty from 4 to 6 or 6 to 8
"Back in a" this 5-letter word! here's a flash--it's how long light takes to go 1 femtometer, a millionth of a millionth of a mm

final_jeopardy.clue: Recorded on a visit to this California city, YouTube's first video featured a man saying, "They have really, really, really long trunks"
